ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $Profile.Name <> 'System Administrator', $Profile.Name <> 'System Administrator API', Probability > 0.95, LEN( Account.AE_to_CSM_handoff_notes__c )< 1, TEXT(SBQQ__PrimaryQuote__r.Configuration_Segment__c) = 'Express', NOT(Is_Webstore_Upsell_Opportunity__c), NOT(Small_Fleet_Opportunity__c) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: AE to CSM Handoff notes must be completed on the account prior to closing
